summary: Phase 3 Team Templates Testing Complete - All NEW Team Templates features tested: 4-step wizard (Step 4 = Team Templates), Template Library with search and category filters, Save as Template dialog, and all CRUD endpoints. 100% backend tests passed (17/17), 100% frontend UI verification passed.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` - minor accessibility warning (same as iteration_1 for Create Folder)

seed_data_creation: None required - testing auth protection and UI flows
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 3 Team Templates feature fully tested. The ResponseWizard now has 4 steps: Step 1 (Search & Context), Step 2 (Draft & Edit with Save as Template button), Step 3 (Saved Drafts), Step 4 (Team Templates with TemplateLibrary). All Team Templates CRUD endpoints return 401 without auth as expected. All data-testids verified: wizard-step-1-btn, wizard-step-4-btn, template-library, template-search-input, template-count-badge, filter-all, save-as-template-btn, template-title-input, template-description-input, template-tag-input, template-shared-toggle, confirm-save-template-btn, category-ife, category-mro, draft-list, new-draft-btn, draft-editor-textarea, draft-title-input, save-draft-btn, copy-draft-btn, back-to-context-btn. SaveAsTemplateDialog has 9 category buttons (IFE, MRO, Catering, Ground Handling, Connectivity, Digital, Safety, Compliance, General), tag input with add/remove, and shared/personal toggle.

frontend_tests_team_templates.wizard_4_steps: PASS - All 4 wizard steps visible and clickable (Search & Context, Draft & Edit, Saved Drafts, Team Templates)
frontend_tests_team_templates.step4_template_library: PASS - TemplateLibrary component loads with search input, count badge, category filters
frontend_tests_team_templates.step2_save_as_template: PASS - Save as Template button present in Draft Editor
frontend_tests_team_templates.save_template_dialog: PASS - Dialog opens with title input, description, 9 category buttons, tag input, shared toggle, save button
frontend_tests_team_templates.all_data_testids: PASS - All 25+ required data-testids verified present
frontend_tests_team_templates.all_platform_pages: PASS - Home, Agents, Workflows, Knowledge Base, Meetings, Response all load correctly
